title: Memory leak in data processing module
description: Application crashes after processing large datasets. Memory usage increases exponentially during batch operations, leading to system instability and potential data corruption.

title: Authentication bypass vulnerability
description: Users can access restricted areas by manipulating session tokens. Critical security flaw that allows unauthorized access to sensitive data and administrative functions.

title: UI layout breaks on mobile devices
description: Navigation menu overlaps content on screens smaller than 768px. Buttons become unclickable and form fields are cut off, making the app unusable on mobile devices.

title: Database connection timeout errors
description: Intermittent database timeouts during peak hours causing 500 errors. Users experience slow loading times and failed transactions during high traffic periods.

title: Incorrect tax calculations in checkout
description: Tax rates are not being applied correctly for international orders. Customers in certain regions are being overcharged or undercharged, affecting revenue and compliance.

title: Search results pagination broken
description: Next/previous buttons in search results don't work properly. Users can't navigate beyond the first page of results, limiting functionality for searches with many results.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Password reset and order confirmation emails are failing to send. Email service integration appears to be broken, affecting user experience and order processing workflow.

title: File upload progress bar stuck at 0%
description: Upload progress indicator doesn't update during file uploads. Files upload successfully but users think the process has failed, leading to confusion and multiple upload attempts.

title: Tooltip text overlaps on hover
description: Help tooltips overlap with other UI elements when displayed. Text becomes unreadable and interferes with navigation, particularly in dense interface areas.

title: Console warnings in browser developer tools
description: Multiple JavaScript warnings appear in browser console. While not affecting functionality, they indicate potential future issues and should be cleaned up for maintainability.

title: API rate limiting causes request failures
description: Third-party API calls are being rate limited during bulk operations. Need to implement proper request throttling and retry logic to handle rate limits gracefully.

title: Dark mode toggle causes visual glitches
description: Switching between light and dark modes causes brief visual artifacts and inconsistent styling. Some elements don't update their colors immediately, creating jarring transitions.

title: Export functionality fails with large datasets
description: CSV and PDF exports timeout when processing more than 10,000 records. Need to implement streaming or chunked export to handle large data volumes efficiently.

title: Form validation errors not clearing properly
description: Error messages persist after users correct form input issues. Users see outdated error messages even when fields are valid, causing confusion during form submission.

title: Keyboard navigation broken in dropdown menus
description: Arrow keys and tab navigation don't work properly in custom dropdown components. Accessibility issue that prevents keyboard-only users from navigating the interface effectively.
